briefdescription.para: displacement dimension
rotation dimension
Dimension types for reduceTo2D and expandTo3D.
Map a Fastor Tensor (const) to an Eigen Map (row-major, const)

simplesect.para: an Eigen Map
This function works for second rank tensors (matrices) of size nRows x nCols.

briefdescription.para: Map a Fastor Tensor to an Eigen Map (row-major)

simplesect.para: an Eigen Map
This function works for second rank tensors (matrices) of size nRows x nCols.

briefdescription.para: Map a Fastor Tensor to an Eigen Map (column vector)

simplesect.para: an Eigen Map
This function works for first rank tensors (vectors) of size nRows.

briefdescription.para: Map a Fastor TensorMap to an Eigen Map (column vector)

simplesect.para: an Eigen Map
This function works only for first rank tensors (vectors) of size nRows.

briefdescription.para: Map a Fastor TensorMap to an Eigen Map (row-major)

simplesect.para: an Eigen Map
This function works only for second rank tensors (matrices) of size nRows x nCols.

briefdescription.para: Copy a Fastor tensor to a column-major array.

parameterdescription.para: a pack of sizes specifying the dimensions of the tensor

briefdescription.para: Reduce a 3D Fastor tensor to a 2D Fastor tensor.

detaileddescription.para:
dims
a pack of DimensionType specifying the conversion from 3D to 2D
T
scalar type
dims3D
a pack of sizes specifying the dimensions of the 3D tensor
theTensor3D
a 3D input tensor
the reduced 2D tensor
This function is used to reduce a displacement and/or rotation tensor in 3D to a displacement and/or rotation tensor in 2D. The conversion is specified by the pack of DimensionType. For displacements (DimensionType U) the dimension is reduced from 3 to 2, for rotations (DimensionType W) the dimension is reduced from 3 to 1.

briefdescription.para: Overload of reduceTo2d for AbstractTensor inputs.

simplesect.para: the reduced 2D tensor

briefdescription.para: Helper function to return 3 for any input size_t.

simplesect.para: always returns 3

briefdescription.para: Expand a 2D Fastor tensor to a 3D Fastor tensor.

detaileddescription.para:
dims
a pack of DimensionType specifying the conversion from 2D to 3D
T
scalar type
dims2D
a pack of sizes specifying the dimensions of the 2D Tensor
theTensor2D
a 2D input tensor
the expanded 3D tensor
This function is used to expand a displacement and/or rotation tensor in 2D to a displacement and/or rotation tensor in 3D. The conversion is specified by the pack of DimensionType. For displacements (DimensionType U) the dimension is expanded from 2 to 3, for rotations (DimensionType W) the dimension is expanded from 1 to 3.

briefdescription.para: Overload of expandTo3D for AbstractTensor inputs.

simplesect.para: the expanded 3D tensor

briefdescription.para: Multiply a Fastor tensor with a scalar.

parameterdescription.para: a pack of sizes specifying the dimensions of the tensor

simplesect.para: the resulting Fastor tensor
This function is a workaround for a bug in Fastor (issue #149).

briefdescription.para: Hardcoded implementation of the Einstein summation for two second order tensors.

detaileddescription.para:
T
scalar type
A
first second order tensor
B
second second order tensor
the resulting scalar
This function computes the Einstein summation for two second order tensors A and B: $ C = A_{ij} B_{ij} $

simplesect.para: This function is a workaround for cases in which Fastor::to_scalar does not work. This is the case for example when T is autodiff::dual.

briefdescription.para: Construct a arbitrary type Fastor tensor from a Fastor double tensor.

parameterdescription.para: a pack of sizes specifying the dimensions of the tensor
a Fastor tensor of type double

simplesect.para: a Fastor tensor of type T
This function is a workaround for lack of casting of pointer types e.g. no cast available for autodiff::dual* and double*

briefdescription.para: Construct a arbitrary type Fastor tensor from a Fastor double tensor map.

parameterdescription.para: a pack of sizes specifying the dimensions of the tensor
a Fastor tensor map of type double

simplesect.para: a Fastor tensor of type T
This function is a workaround for lack of casting of pointer types e.g. no cast available for autodiff::dual* and double*

briefdescription.para: Extract the real part of a Fastor tensor of arbitrary type.

parameterdescription.para: a pack of sizes specifying the dimensions of the tensor
a Fastor tensor of type T

simplesect.para: a Fastor tensor of type double

briefdescription.para: Construct a Fastor tensor of autodiff::dual from a Fastor tensor of arbitrary type.

a Fastor tensor of type T

simplesect.para: a Fastor tensor of type autodiff::dual

memberdef.name: makeHigherOrderDual

briefdescription.para: Construct a Fastor tensor of autodiff::HigherOrderDual from a Fastor double tensor.

parameterdescription.para: a pack of sizes specifying the dimensions of the tensor
a Fastor tensor of type double

simplesect.para: a Fastor tensor of type autodiff::HigherOrderDual

briefdescription.para: Compute the symmetric part of a second order 3D Fastor tensor.

detaileddescription.para:
T
scalar type
t
a second order Fastor tensor
the symmetric part of the tensor
It actually computes $ \text{sym}\, t_ij = 0.5 ( t_{ij} + t_{ji} ) $

briefdescription.para: Compute the deviatoric part of a second order 3D Fastor tensor.

detaileddescription.para:
T
scalar type
t
a second order Fastor tensor
the deviatoric part of the tensor
It actually computes $ \text{dev} \, t_{ij} = t_{ij} - \frac{1}{3}t_{kk}\delta_{ij}$
